contentrichtext.text: {{Wiktionary}} The word '''yaw''' can refer to: * [[Yaw angle]], one of the [[Tait-Bryan angles]], describing the heading of a vehicle or machine, and some other related elements: **[[Yaw system]], component responsible for the orientation of a wind turbine towards the wind. **[[Yaw bearing]], one of the components to keep optimal heading in a [[wind turbine]]. *[[Aircraft principal axes|Yaw]], rotation around the vertical axis in aircraft, an aspect of [[Flight dynamics (aircraft)|flight dynamics]] and some other related elements: **[[Yaw (rotation)]] **an [[Aerobatic maneuver]], rotation around the vertical axis **[[Yaw rate sensor]], angular speed of yaw rotation * [[Yaw (god)]], Levantine god * [[Yaw drive]], wind turbine component * [[YAW]], Halifax/Shearwater Heliport's IATA code * [[Ellen Beach Yaw]] (1869–1947), concert singer * YÃ w, Thursday, see [[Akan day names]] * [[Yaw-Yan]], Filipino martial art * [[Yaws]], tropical disease * [[Yaws (web server)]] * [[Yaw (ethnic group)]], a [[Burma|Burmese]] ethnic group * [[YAW (Yoonu Askaan Wi)]], a Senegalese political party * Yaw, a [[Ghanaian name]] for a boy born on Thursday ==See also== * [[Yours (disambiguation)]], various meanings, most prominently as a pronoun {{disambig}}
